text: @RobynVinter Taken on the way back to our old flat after a day hanging out with mum. I wasnt feeling well, neither was she. The following weekend, on lockdown, my parents laid up with what may have been coronavirus. I, thankfully, was just suffering with my usual chronic fatigue. https://t.co/tFKr1rzy5T
